name: Mine Hazards
description:
The underground mine you're working in is collapsing!
Stay safe, child, help is coming...

(But don't forget to bring me nice shiny stuff is you manage to find some.)

Wall-jump and swing me that pickaxe, ye!

WASD (or ZQSD) to move (customisable)
SPACE to use the pickaxe (customisable)
P to pause
SPACE to start
ECHAP to come back here

Made alone in 72h
All art, sound, specific engine, etc. were made during the jam <3
Made with Clickteam Fusion 2.5, for the best and for the worst. Will update sources later =)

EDIT:
The corrected version is the exact same as the one uploaded for the jam, except :
